 2021-04862021-06-01,  HC,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Centre on Substance Abuse Act
PrecisRe-appointment of VAUGHAN DOWIE of Toronto, Ontario, as Chairperson of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Centre on Substance Abuse, to hold office during pleasure for a term of eighteen months.
